animeDescription: Murakami made this movie in cooperation with Louis Vuitton, the handbag producer. It is more a commercial for Louis Vuitton than it is an anime movie, however the animation is quite special.
animeStaff: [['Murakami Takashi', ['Producer', 'Art Director']], ['Hosoda Mamoru', ['Director']], ['Shida Naotoshi', ['Key Animation']], ['Yamamuro Tadayoshi', ['Key Animation']]]
